Structs/Task.html.name: Task
Structs/Task.html.abstract: Encapsulates launching a RxSwift powered command line task.

Protocols/TaskEventType.html#/s:vP6RxTas.name: exitStatus
Protocols/TaskEventType.html#/s:vP6RxTas.abstract: The exit status code if available, nil otherwise.

Protocols/TaskEventType.html#/s:vP6RxTas.name: output
Protocols/TaskEventType.html#/s:vP6RxTas.abstract: The output of the event if available, nil otherwise.

Protocols/TaskEventType.html.name: TaskEventType
Protocols/TaskEventType.html.abstract: A protocol encapsulated TaskEvent. Necessary to create Observable operators and not intended for public use.

Extensions/Observable.html#/s:Fe6RxTaskR.name: justExitStatus()
Extensions/Observable.html#/s:Fe6RxTaskR.abstract: Filters out the output and launch events to produce just an Observable of the exit status.

Extensions/Observable.html#/s:Fe6RxTaskR.name: justOutput()
Extensions/Observable.html#/s:Fe6RxTaskR.abstract: Filters out the launch and exit events to just produce and Observable of the output (stdout and stderr).

Enums/TaskEvent.html#/s:vO6RxTask9TaskEv.name: exitStatus
Enums/TaskEvent.html#/s:vO6RxTask9TaskEv.abstract: The exit status code if available, nil otherwise.

Enums/TaskEvent.html#/s:vO6RxTask9TaskEv.name: output
Enums/TaskEvent.html#/s:vO6RxTask9TaskEv.abstract: The output of the event if available, nil otherwise.

Enums/TaskError.html.name: TaskError
Enums/TaskError.html.abstract: An error encountered in the execution of a Task.
